name: Mega Man Anniversary Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic McOrigins
description: Sonic McOrigins is a fanmade remake collection of the Sonic Heroes McDonalds LCD games.

name: Lucha Masters StickerMania
description:
Lucha Masters StickerMania is an action and platform game, you will play with Lucho, a small axolotl with a big dream, be a Luchador.
Lucho meddles in a new problem, mistakenly releases the god of jokes Mexica, a coyote, the god Huehuecoyotl, who for fun makes a joke: Destroy reality.

You will enter a world of video games and you will visit several cities in Mexico to prevent the Coyote's plan.

You will not be alone in this adventure, you will be able to play with professional Wrestlers such as the Legend Octagon , the Son of Octagon, Coco Rojo Segundo, Dr. Karonte Jr. and many more. Rudos and Técnicos come together to stop this threat.

Face monsters like the Mummies of Guanajuato, the Witch of Catemaco, the Vampire of Guadalajara, La Llorona and many more.

Will you have enough courage to stop a god, become a Luchador and eat many chilaquiles?

Get ready to be a Lucha Master.

name: Dyatlov Canyon
description: This is a collection of seven vanilla compatible maps, with slightly more focus on story.

name: Bleak
description: An atmospheric mini wad with the vibes of atmospheric horror, fear of the unknown, Lovecraft inspired.

name: Afternoon
description: Afternoon is a boom-compatible speedmap project by Ludi and their friends. There are 15 maps in total, and one should expect a strong variety of gameplay styles and visuals going in. The difficulty generally scales from IWAD difficulty to Scythe 2, but great care has been given to pacing and making sure each map flows in a cohesive manner.

name: Hysteria in Howlsbend
description: Set in a colonial-era New England town driven to hysteria when a beloved member of the community is afflicted by a witch. The player leads the witch hunt by having typed one-on-one conversations with a cast of characters powered by GPT-3.

name: Serenade
description: A vanilla Doom 2 megawad consisting of 32 maps. Following the same basic premise as Silence, I intend to replace the original game in the style of Doom 2 the Way Id Did, but with that in mind I think it's still important to note that this gets a fair bit harder than Silence and Doom 2.

name: Princess of Nothing
description: Simple little F/F fantasy I made in a day to test out RPG Maker MV. Might expand on it, might not. Have fun.

name: I am Feeling Things
description: This tiny bitsy game / visual novel tells the story of Lydia and Ophelia - two lesbians that experience their first date in person, after they have been talking online for a while. The scene takes place in a tiny café, on a rainy day.

name: Swallow Nine Tails
description: A game about the nature of dead things and the living and the still-dead languages of both for those who may be alive. But whom everyone else will see as dead or an animal.

name: Pillow Talk at the End of All Things.
description:
A calm and quiet night in Rio de Janeiro.

That is until you hear a shot. And another. And yet another one. The timing gets faster, with more shots, shots with different sounds. You wake up and realize something is happening in the favela nearby. Either gang violence or state violence, you never really know.

That's the same situation where Lenon finds herself for the first time, and now it's up for her "friend" Graves to help her not to panic. It's just another night in Rio, and you know things will move on as always after that.

Pillow Talk at the end of all things is a small yuri visual novel about trying to get calm during a time when violence is commonplace, and expected. Follow Lenon and Graves during what is just another night in the Cidade Maravilhosa.

name: Domestic Dreams and Robots
description: Sin descripción

name: You're Cookin', Good Lookin'!
description:
You're Cookin', Good Lookin' is a 2D fighting game!

This game was created for Yuri Jam 2022. Mio and Beatriz are a married couple who, despite both being professionals in the cullinary industry, are fighting to decide who's cooking dinner tonight!

name: I Became a Proper Member and Got a Girlfriend
description:
Hikigaya Komori grew up in the middle of nowhere and learned everything she knows about human behavior and social dynamics from reading books and playing dating sims. Once, she went to a restaurant with her parents and said 'Thanks, you too!' to a waiter who told her to enjoy her meal. ...She hasn't had the courage to show her face there since. But fortune is a fickle mistress, and much to the chagrin of her and her classmates, she's found herself in the window seat at the back of the classroom normally set aside for the main character. And when one misunderstanding leads to another, she briefly considers writing an autobiography and titling it 'A Series of Unfortunate Events,' copyright be damned.

Kohinata Koharu is the former student council president and resident popular girl, considered mysterious by some and out of reach to all. It was by sheer happenstance she passed by Komori's classroom when she did, inadvertently saving her from the wonton wrath of her peers. But an accident is just fate by another name, and on a whim, she takes a blossoming interest in the other... with no ulterior motives whatsoever. Setting aside the fact that Komori doesn't believe in genuine altruism, she can't figure out why someone at the top of the pecking order would rub shoulders with a lowly ant like her... But for the longest time, she has wanted to change... if only she could. Now that she can, the opportunity is paired with the harrowing realization that rest of her youth depends on Koharu's opinion of her. When she said "this couldn't possibly get any worse!!", that wasn't a challenge, you know!!! So it's easier said than done... but that doesn't mean she doesn't want to try! After all, this is the kind of once-in-a-lifetime opportunity that someone like her could only dream of!!

Will Komori be able to grow out of her shell, or will her life turn into a tragedy worthy of Shakespeare himself? Can she really get through all the items on her 'how to properly enjoy my youth! ♡' checklist when it's been untouched for over a year?? A thriving social life might be a bit of a stretch, but surely, she can manage to make a few friends, right?

...Right??

name: Blasé Ace
description:
Anime clichés just don't hit the same when you're sex-averse. Maybe you're not bawling over how this guy slipped face-first into your crotch. You might not even be disturbed, just...like...confused?

Join NB student Beverly Nicks on a short, funny, positive, be-yourselfy kind of a journey.

name: Chocolate Confession
description:
Take the place of the protagonist Kaori and live two love triangles between your friends Darius and Cloud and a confession in between!

Chocolate Confession
St. Valentine is coming, and your heart starts to beat differently for one of your firends... You want to seize this day and confess and that everything will be perfect. But... Are things really going to be as you planned? Or would they be even better?

Chocolate Confession Christmas Special
It saddens you to learn this will be the first Christmas you won't spend together with your childhood friends Darius and Cloud. But one of them left a mysterious invitation to spend that day together. And it dosen't sound it's just as friends... Which one of them do you wish it was?

name: Hello Kitty Cafe
description: Venture into a cafe business with Hello Kitty! Hire your favorite Sanrio characters to help you and Kitty run the day-to-day cafe operations. Turn your cafe into the cutest, coziest and happiest place ever!

name: Gordy and the Monster Moon
description: Gordy and the Monster Moon is a bite-sized exploration-driven game about a pumpkin astronaut going on spooky adventures.

name: Mario Remix: Boss Edition
description:
In Mario Remix: Boss Edition you're up against 35 famous and original bosses from past series. It also includes an item system and original minigames.

A long time ago I made Mario Remix. Ever since then I've been wanting to do another Mario crossover game. Well, I've finally gotten around to doing it. I've always loved a good boss fight. Enjoy!

name: Mouthwashing
description: The five crew members of The Tulpar are stranded in the empty reaches of space, shrouded in perpetual sunset. God is not watching.

name: Adventure Game
description: An irreverent low-poly action RPG made through Net Yaroze for the original Playstation

name: EA Sports WRC
description:
EA Sports WRC boasts 10 current WRC, WRC2, and Junior WRC vehicles and 68 of the most iconic rally cars spanning 60 years of the sport.

Working together with official WRC teams and manufacturers, such as Ford, Toyota, and Hyundai, each vehicle is built to tackle every challenge they'll face throughout the season. The hybrid-powered 4WD Rally1 cars are some of the fastest in the sport's history, capable of incredible speeds while tackling gravity-defying jumps, deteriorating surfaces, and adverse weather.

name: Tempest Enterprise
description: Tempest Enterprise is a new episode for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards, lead by 40oz.

name: Castle Fantasia: Arihato Senki
description: A prequel to Castle Fantasia: Seima Taisen, follows Hewie and Ducis's stories during their time in the military academy.

name: Super Go-Kart Racing
description: Super Mario Kart began development as a straight-forward go-kart racing game before switching directions and adding elements from the Mushroom Kingdom. Super Go-Kart Racing aims to “recreate” what the original intention of the game was. There are no weapons, coins or jumps. It’s just no-frills racing across 20 brand-new tracks set in realistic go-kart race locations. All of the music and many of the sounds have been changed to create a different experience.

name: The Legend of Super Mario: Save Mushroom Kingdom
description:
Welcome to Mushroom Kingdom, where Bowser has captured Princess Toadstool and thrown the Kingdom into tyranny. It is up to a heroic plumber named Mario to find all Starmen, become super and save the day!

Along the way you’ll be challenged by Goombas, Koopas and an endless array of ruthless creatures who will stop at nothing to prevent you from finding the 8 Starmen of power. Please hurry up and rescue Peach!

name: Art of Speed
description: A game made for the speedrunning community. Fight through the enemies and parkour on platforms to finish the maps as soon as possible.​

name: Cory in the Ded 3.5
description: Cory in the Ded 3.5 is the next evolution in gaming, featuring a whopping nine playable characters with the most revolutionary gameplay of all time.

name: Minecraft Lockout
description: Minecraft Lockout is a minigame mod for Minecraft. 2 teams are given a set of 25 randomized tasks to do in a world and they have to race each other until one team completes 13 goals.

name: Kisou Shinden: Gen-Kaiser
description:
A scientist named Zen Shiratori was investigating the ruins of an ancient Mayan temple, convinced that the proof of the existence of a parallel world lies there. He found a strange glowing orb, which was later accidentally discover by his fourteen-year-old son Gen, who was rummaging through Dad's collection. As a result, Gen was indeed teleported into a parallel world. There, he meets a young girl named Rinna, who tells him that he is, in fact, "Gen-Kaiser", the much-expected savior of their world. Piloting giant combat robots, the two must protect the innocents of that world and defeat evil.

Kisō Shinden: Gen-Kaiser is a turn-based strategy/RPG hybrid (what is commonly called in Japan a "tactical RPG"). There is overworld navigation, and the player can also visit and explore cities; however, these features are rather rudimentary, and hostile areas cannot be explored in real time and are presented as large-scale strategic battles. The characters move in turns over the top-down battlefield and attack when enemies are in range. Animations are displayed for each attack, and experience points are awarded for successful elimination of an enemy.

name: XF Extreme Formula
description: Race at the speed of sound and beyond in the great XF Extreme Formula championship!

name: Lego Worlds: Agents Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: Spongebob Racing Season
description: Sin descripción

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: Superman
description: Sin descripción

name: Lego Jurassic World DLC Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Lego Batman 2: Heroes Character Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham - Arrow Pack
description: Inspired by the popular TV series, this pack is set after the shipwreck that leaves Oliver trapped on a treacherous island with Slade Wilson. Experience Oliver’s survival training as they work their way through the jungle to a mercenary camp. In addition to Oliver and Slade, play as fan favorite characters Diggle, Felicity Smoak, Helena Bertinelli, Malcolm Merlyn, Roy Harper and Sarah Lance.

name: Forza Horizion 5: Barbie The Movie Car Pack
description: This Barbie is a gamer! Together with Warner Bros. Pictures and Mattel, Xbox is excited to invite fans on a fun, fashionable, and inspirational ride this summer to celebrate the much-anticipated release of the new movie “Barbie,” premiering in theaters on July 21. Bringing Barbie’s signature flair to our gaming platform, we’re honoring all that there is to love about this iconic role model: her persevering optimism, wide-ranging career journey and never-ending capacity for self-discovery. Audiences of “Barbie” will follow the heroine to the furthest reaches of Barbie Land and beyond, and now fans can follow in her high-heeled footsteps with exclusive Forza Horizon 5 in-game content

name: Lego Star Wars the Force Awakens: Droids character Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: Street Fighter Ryu
description: Sin descripción

name: For a Reason
description:
For A Reason is a sapphic visual novel set in a witch's academy setting featuring two playable characters and one route for each character. Talk to your crush, solve a mystery, and... drink some juice?

Play as Jane Laguerre, a member of arts and performance club who doesn't have the guts to even walk on the stage, and help navigate her way to confess to her idol. Or play as Lora Wiley and have a cute totally-not-date with her 'friend' who is better than her in every way!

name: Insanity Edged
description: Insanity Edged is a GZDoom mod for Doom 2 with 3 playable maps, a new set of weapons, and a cinematic story line. It takes place in the same universe as Winter's Fury.

name: Ninja Arashi
description:
Ninja Arashi is an intense platformer with mixed RPG elements. In this game, you play as Arashi, a former legendary ninja who fights his way through the corrupted world to save his kidnapped son from the hand of the shadow devil Orochi. With superior acrobatic and deadly weapons, Arashi is ready to face menacing traps and enemies who have sworn to protect the shadow devil Orochi.
Ninja Arashi features simple yet addicting gameplay, giving you thrilling moments and an unexpected experience. You can upgrade abilities using gold and diamond collected from enemies and the environment in order to keep tracks with the difficulty of the game. Manuever through traps, lay waste on enemies who try to stop you and rescue your son.

name: Fire Chief
description: Help the fire chief get to the building fire before it's to late, and then help the fire chief rescue computer disks from a burning building.

name: Geico Football
description: Are you a football star? Do you have what it takes to be the next MVG (Most Valuable Gecko) Quarterback? Test your skills on the ground, in a volcano and in outerspace. Make sure you avoid the obstacles because the longer you stay in the game the higher your score will be. Challenge yourself to beat your high score!

name: Geico Baseball
description: America's favorite pastime just got even better! Hit one out of the park as the Gecko hurls his best pitches. Can you handle the Gecko’s lightning fast pitches?

name: Geico Golf
description: Geico Golf is a delisted golf game that was included in the Geico Arcade app bundle.

name: Geico Pinball
description: A pinball game based on the Geico Gecko.

name: Aster
description: Aster is a classic arcade style shooter, with fast action, aliens, (and sex). Earth is fighting a losing battle against aliens from another galaxy, and things are looking bleak. In a desperate gambit, Earth's military calls upon a hired gun to turn the tide.

name: Even More Bloons
description: Play Even More Bloons now! While away the time popping another 50 levels of Ninja Kiwis Bloons game. Enjoy the new helium bloons, as well as the angled rubber blocks for crazy bounce fun!

name: Desktop Agents: Covid-999
description: Consider wearing a mask to play. A virtual alien virus COV1D-999 uses dramatic scenes from movies and series in order to conquer your PC. Interact with your desktop while playing, watch Youtube videos, chat with your friends and more! Wash your hands after playing.

name: Rebel Maneuver Linus
description: Sin descripción

name: Three Minutes With Your Dog
description: Play with your trusty dog today! The sky is clear, the sun is shining and oh cool, theres a dog walking his huma-

name: Wings
description: Wings is a freeware video game (originally shareware) created by Miika Virpioja. A 2D, DOS-based computer game with space ships that behave like lunar landers. The player can select one of 33 weapons, and the surroundings can be destroyed. The game includes multiplayer capabilities, either through linked PCs or two or more players using one keyboard plus gamepads/joysticks. In the original shareware version certain weapons were locked until the game was registered.

name: Sudoku: The Mind Game
description: Sudoku for DOS with three levels of difficulty.

name: Adventure Ponies
description: A fan made remake of Adventure Ponies for the Atari XL/XE.

name: Knuckles the Echidna in Sonic the Hedgehog
description:
Knuckles the Echidna in Sonic the Hedgehog was a planned add-on for Sonic the Hedgehog which allowed you to play as Knuckles by attaching the cartridge to Sonic & Knuckles. The game was only previewed once in volume 44 of SEGA Megazone.

The game was later replaced by Blue Sphere in the final release of Sonic & Knuckles.

name: Sudoku
description: A homebrew game of Sudoku for Atari 8 bit systems.

name: S.U.D.O.K.U.
description: Place a number inside a square grid and ensure that all rows and columns do not contain the same number twice.

name: Web Sudoku
description: To complete the Sudoku puzzle, enter numbers into the spaces so that each row, column and 3×3 box contains the digits 1 to 9 without repeats.

name: Skibidi Toilet Attack
description: Take control of the Skibidi Toilet and destroy all pinatas with his powerful guns.

name: Evilmun Family 1.2.1 Forrest Fuss
description: Sin descripción

name: Thinkin' Things: All Around Frippletown
description: Thinkin' Things Frippletown offers age-appropriate activities that allow students to explore and practice various thinking strategies, including analyzing attributes, using logic, working backwards, identifying multiple solutions, and practicing creativity.

name: Aries
description:
A fallen angel studying in a "special angel school" to become independent has to go to earth to study the behavior of regular humans.

This particular angel doesn't understand love well, and comes to live a happy campus life with the protagonist to better her understanding of it.

name: Hugo: Jungle Island 1
description: The friendly troll Hugo's arch-enemy, the evil witch Scylla, has moved to a jungle island, where she teamed up with the local tyrant Don Croco. Scylla then once again kidnapped Hugo's wife Hugolina and the children, but this time she keeps them captive in a cage in her new lair, located at a top of volcano in the center of the island. Control Hugo, aided by the monkey Jean Paul and the toucan Ferdinand, as you need to complete a series of minigames to reach and defeat the witch and free Hugo's family.

name: Grand Theft Auto Online: Beach Bum
description: Beach Bum Update — Content update introducing two new weapons (the Broken Bottle and the SNS Pistol), three new cars (the BF Bifta, the Canis Kalahari and the Bravado Paradise) and a new boat (the Pegassi Speeder), as well as additional beach-themed clothing, tattoos, hairstyles and jobs. The weapons and vehicles are also available in GTA V's story mode.

name: Shrink Assault
description: Shrink Assault is a Sci-Fi game featuring a mix of Infinite Runners and Rail Shooter games. Skilfully control your spaceship to dodge obstacles and shoot enemies.

name: Another Happiness
description: Minimalist RPG Maker conversational game

name: Doggie Blues 3D
description: Doggie Blues 3D is a short 3D platformer released on Android and iOS in December 2012.

name: Villa de la Muerte
description: This was a map originally made for a vaguely spain/syringe inspired project but, decided after some time to release on its own.

name: Carol Vorderman's Sudoku DVD Game
description: Play interactive Sudoku games on your DVD player.

name: 2048 Pool
description: Collide two numbers of the same value so they merge into one. Your goal is to reach as high of a score as possible. Each hit takes some of your energy, however, colliding the balls replenishes the energy.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 2: Dash!
description: Sonic the Hedgehog 2: Dash! is a J2ME port of Sonic the Hedgehog 2 released in 2008. The port features the first half of the game.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 2: Crash!
description: Sonic the Hedgehog 2: Crash! is a J2ME port of Sonic the Hedgehog 2 released in 2008. The game is a continuation of Sonic the Hedgehog 2: Dash! and features the last few zones of the game.

name: The Noose
description:
"My older sister killed me.
My younger sister hung me.
I killed my older sister."

This was... everything her dead brother wrote in his diary.
He'd said he'd be right back, but he never returned.
Shortly after, they found his bloody hat.

name: Borderlands Collection: Pandora's Box
description:
For the first time ever, get all six Borderlands adventures together in one mayhem-fueled package, all at an incredible value!

Includes all six acclaimed base games from the Borderlands franchise: Borderlands, Borderlands 2, Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel, Tales from the Borderlands, Borderlands 3, and New Tales from the Borderlands, as well as all of their add-on content, in one giant bundle.

name: Flakboy
description:
Flakboy is a physics game where the player places various kinds of deadly traps to damage an immortal creature called flakboy in a weapon testing facility. The goal is to strategically place these traps to get the most damage on flakboy using the given budget.

First, the player must place a duck box to scare flakboy to the opposite direction, where he will be hit by the first trap. After being hit once, flakboy turns into a ragdoll and is completely relied on physics to move around. The player can use mines, spikes, gun turrets, missiles and trampolines to both damage and move flakboy so he can be hit by other traps.

name: Banishers: Ghosts of New Eden - Red Echoes Edition
description: The Red Echoes Edition of Banishers: Ghosts of New Eden contains: an ancient, leather-effect notebook illustrated with Red's memories, an ink writing set, the game on the platform of your choice and the Wanderer Set DLC!

name: Street Fighter V: Lucia
description: This DLC adds Lucia as a fighter.

name: Street Fighter V: Poison
description: This DLC adds Poison as a fighter.

name: Blade of Darkness
description: Sin descripción

name: Mutant Express
description: This is a platform jumping game for delivering goods in a limited time category. Players need to avoid obstacles, mechanisms, and monsters along the way, and can kill them. Completing challenging levels within a limited time will earn rewards, but there will be no rewards beyond that time.

name: Terminal Theatre Soft
description: Probably as long as a place buries a corpse, it will really bind a living person.I would look back without hesitation, because when we walked together through the cold and wet mansion, I saw all the lives we spent together, and in the last moment, I chose to remember.

name: Super Ship Blaster
description: This is a game that combines drifting and shooting. Players control various space ships to challenge incoming enemies. During battles, they collect different bullets and items to enhance themselves. The default basic controls for the game are as follows:

name: Misty Islands
description: A mysterious shipwreck, an uninhabited island, a box of mysterious goods, and a survival adventure

name: Street Fighter V: E.Honda
description: This DLC adds Honda as a fighter.

name: Descriptionary
description:
Descriptionary is like a classic drawing board game, but the roles are reversed; instead of drawing something based on a prompt while others guess what you’re drawing, you’re given a vague description of something and then you have to guess what you were supposed to be drawing!

Join our bunny-themed cast featuring a wide variety of characters who all need your help! Try to navigate their individual mannerisms in order to depict what they’re trying to describe, all under a time limit.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: Chevy 1956
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Archives: Cadash
description: Face countless dangers on your quest to save Princess Sarasa from the clutches of the evil Barrog !

name: Legions
description: Legions is retro arcade game where the player defends their army from elimination. A sword paddle is used to bounce a shield ball back and forth against the opposing player. Collect powerups to whittle down the forces of the enemy army or the enemy’s paddle. The last one standing is the victor!

name: Girls Creation: Shoujo Geijutsu Kitan
description: Sin descripción

name: Troopers
description: A singleplayer first-person shooter in a low poly art! Play epic matches in different game modes, rank up and unlock new weaponskins, attachments and weapons.

name: River Pirates
description:
Easy to play Tower Defense game with a pirates setting.

River Pirates has an invading horde of pirates sailing up river to attack your stronghold. You defend your keep by placing a variety of defenses along the river's banks to prevent the pirates from navigating the river from one side of the screen to the other.

name: Overpass 2
description: Identify the best routes and balance of power, speed and precision to overcome obstacles at the controls of a UTV, ATV or Rock Bouncer. In both solo and multiplayer mode, your talent and choices of technique will make the difference.

name: 0 Rally Desert Race: Offroad Dirt Simulator
description: 0 Rally Desert Race: Offroad Dirt Simulator will take you on an adrenaline-fueled journey into the heart of rally racing. Get ready to experience the thrill of high-speed off-road competitions in this dynamic game!

name: Celebrities Hacked: Scarlet Photo Pack
description: Dazzling starlet, known for her fiery red hair and elegance. With a fondness for pink, she enjoys the luxuries, only donning faux fur, highlighting her caring heart. Ready to be captivated by her allure?

name: Celebrities Hacked: Penelope Photo Pack
description: Step into the intriguing world of Penelope, a fascinating blend of modest charm and astute brilliance. Nestled within the vibrant hum of a hotel bar, she silently whispers a tale waiting to be discovered. Eager for an exhilarating adventure? Let's unravel her mystery together!

name: Celebrities Hacked: ArmourLilly Photo Pack
description: Armourlily, a blonde bombshell, is an ex-pro swimmer whose career was cut short by a car accident risking spine damage. Forced into a wheelchair for 3 years, her relentless spirit inspired many. Known for her witty TV personality, her optimism is infectious.

name: Celebrities Hacked: KittyLock Photo Pack
description: KittyLock, adorned with signature kitten ears, exudes originality. Known for her dynamic stage performances, she is a sensation in sensual gymnastics. Overcoming a tough past through online visibility, she is loved for her unique style. Ready to be mesmerized by her performance?

name: Diary of Lucie: Hammer Weapon Pack
description: New Weapon: Hammer 13 types of weapons and 14 types of related weapon characteristics are added.

name: Pixel Puzzles WW2 Jigsaw: Pack - German Railway Guns
description: Pixel Puzzles World War II, merging history with the definitive jigsaw puzzler on the PC platform.

name: Space Engineers: Decorative Pack #3
description: Space Engineers Space Engineers: Decorative Pack #3 includes Warworn Armor Skin, Cab Cockpit, Twin-blade Wind Turbine, Colorable Solar Panels, Holo LCD, Inset LCD panel, Sloped LCD panel, Curved LCD panel, Round Beacon, Inset Couch, Inset Bed, Inset Button Panel, Entertainment Corner and many more.

name: Hapy-y
description: The world's first "attuned" superhuman gets stuck in a quest room about his own life. The puzzles seem easy, but at one point his way out turns into a nightmare...

name: Zero End: Chapter One
description: Zero End is a paranormal mystery adult Visual Novel with horror elements where you try to find the truth behind the sinister happenings at Altham Academy.

name: Waking Up: Way Back Home
description: A child infiltrates a spaceship to carry out a secret rescue mission. His objective is compromised when they must make a forced landing on a strange planet. Explore this mysterious place, overcome obstacles, and find the way back home!

name: Wasard
description: Wasard is a wacky, rogue-lite, single stick shooter. Maneuver your auto-casting wizard between dangerous enemies and hundreds of projectiles. Purchase passive charms, unlock permanent wards, and use powerful relics to give yourself an edge in each new randomly generated dungeon.

name: We Could Be Heroes
description: We Could Be Heroes is a retro style, action packed beat ‘em up in the style of classic 90s brawler arcade titles. Featuring a huge array of attacks, destructible environments and brutal deaths. Become a hero and fight bad guys while stopping crimes and rescuing innocent civilians along the way.

name: X-Plane 12: Aerosoft - Seychelles XP
description: The Seychelles are a group of islands in the Indian Ocean - but what comes into most people’s minds when they think about the name is a tropical paradise, luxurious holidays, excellent diving spots and breathtakingly beautiful nature.

name: You're Not Family
description: A (really short) free narrative rhythm game by Atiya Nova. Attend a family dinner and time your key presses to the flow of conversation. Features lots of familial tension with a dash of misery. And cute bunnies!

name: Yeet
description: Adrenaline fueled, fast paced combat with a satisfying twist. Battle your friends by yeeting, dashing, and flying around an arena with devastating strength and speed!

name: Xerme
description: Enter Xerme, a mysterious world full of challenging puzzles and unique discoveries on a journey of evolution and exploration.

name: Woodland Town
description: Embark on a cozy journey of discovery and wonder in this enchanting exploration game. Immerse yourself in the lush embrace of a mystical town and the adjacent forest, where hidden objectives await your keen eye!

name: Wildwood Down
description: Step into the hilariously twisted world of Wildwood Down, a side-splitting comedy horror point-and-click adventure set in the charming heart of Wildwood, NJ, where every corner hides a blend of mystery and laughter, perfect for fans of the genre and new comers looking for a wild ride!

name: Wild Wild Space
description: Welcome to the New Wild West! Join a space gang, become the galaxy's most dangerous outlaw, explore planets filled with enemy space gangs and shoot your way through them in this bullet hellish galaxy-crawler roguelite.

name: Wild Alone
description: Powered by Unreal Engine 4. As you find yourself stranded on an island overrun by vicious dinosaurs and mutants, you must fight to survive and make your escape. Explore the island's dangerous landscapes, capture and raise dinosaurs to aid your journey, and outsmart the deadly creatures.

name: Wedding Witch
description: There is a witch here preparing to marry you. She embarks on an adventure to find the succubus's potion to seduce you. But a forest filled with demons stands in her way... Will she be able to find the succubus's potion and have a happy wedding?

name: Winter Valley Hike
description: Embark on a serene journey through the enchanting Winter Valley, a place of tranquility and discovery. Immerse yourself in the beauty of nature as you roam freely, seeking out hidden treasures and unique locations that will leave you breathless.

name: Vasilisas Torment
description: Pass all the tests to free the soul of Vasilisa. But will you be able to do it and will you have enough skills to overcome the ingenious traps that the evil spirits set up.

name: Visions of Evil
description: Enter a haunted world in Visions of Evil, a 4v1 asymmetrical PvP Horror game. Explore abandoned areas with your team, battle hellish entities, and use ancient weapons and artifacts to survive and banish the evil. Are you ready to face your fears?

name: VonGarland Castle: Sacrilege of the Night
description: VonGarland Castle : Sacrilege of the Night a love letter to action platformer classics like Castlevania, Super Metroid and Mega Man X.

name: Waifu Force
description: Blast off into an energetic 2D space shooter and face a diverse roster of captivating bosses. Engage in high-energy battles with powerful weapons, set to a fun anime-inspired visual style. Enjoy a unique narrative and spicy NSFW surprises sprinkled throughout!

name: Virago: Reality New
description: Virago: Reality New invites you to a chilling adventure where you guide Willow, a survivor escaping abuse, through a world of terror. Master the torchlight, outwit relentless stalkers, and navigate between reality and nightmare. Can you ensure Willow's survival in this heart-pounding pursuit?

name: Vault Apocalypsis
description: Vault Apocalypsis is a top-down roguelite arena shooter where you fight off hordes of monsters on your quest to stay the apocalypse. Power up your character, create outrageous synergies and take your build as far as you can. Invite your friends for up to 4 player online co-op.

name: Varkij: Dream and Nightmare
description: A turn-based RPG with tones of Dragon characters who unite to either end, embrace or save the Nightmare Dragon.

name: Valdamour
description: Valdamour is a multiplayer asymmetric PvP where the exorcist player performs rituals in a haunted mansion, while the ghost player tries to stop him by using his arsenal of spooky abilities. Avoid the ghost's attempts at killing you before you can complete the final ritual and exorcise it for good.

name: Untrusted: Hackers at Large
description: In this short single player command line adventure (set in the Untrusted world) you'll be playing as various hackers getting into computer systems to hack, steal and sabotage. Manage your crew to blackmail, extort or murder your targets. Investigate. Hack. Don't Die.

name: Unreal Lust Theory
description: Dive into the seductive world of Unreal Lust Theory, a 3D adult game packed with quests and steamy encounters. Live out your fantasies as a 20-year-old, navigating interactions with a variety of alluring female characters. Embark on a journey where choices lead to thrilling outcomes.

name: Unknown Memories: Lost Reality
description: Experience the world of liminal spaces from the perspective of a VHS camera. The architecture looks so weird and same. Is it all just a dream? everything is so empty and yet so spooky... where is everyone else? ....

name: Tyrone Soulz
description: It was supposed to be an uneventful arrest, but after the suspect made a blood pact with Moloch, this rookie cop is in for much more than he bargained for. Can he defeat Tyrone and return home to his family?

name: Twisty Puzzle World
description: Twisty Puzzle World: 400+ twisty / magic puzzles, and an editor to make your own puzzles.

name: Turbo Tails
description: Animals are flocking to see the annual Turbo Tails Tournament! Pick your animal racer, navigate diverse locations, devour treats to unleash turbo power, outwit rivals and savor the thrill of a racing adventure like no other!

name: True Abstraction: Rewind
description: You'll need to solve chambers in the secret moon facility. But be careful because something is trying to kill you without thinking. Nobody will cry about your death.

name: Traveler's Tavern
description: "Traveler's Tavern" is a business simulation game. Your goal is to build a prosperous tavern and attract more customers by providing high-quality service, cooking food, unlocking new recipes and improving the reputation of the tavern.

name: Arch Rivals
description: Arch Rivals is a one-in-the-chamber platform fighter where you duel your friends with your bow and arrow. Aim carefully and hope that you can pick your arrow back up!

name: Beat Survival
description: Beat Survival is 2D pixel action-adventure survival game where you can play as single or in 2 players local co-op where you start driving around, looting, scavenging, crafting, fishing, dismantling and do more missions. Not only you fight the bad guy and zombies, but you also interact with others.

name: Absolute Doppelkopf for Windows 11
description: This new version of "Absolute Doppelkopf for Windows 11" contains an extended set of rules with an extensive compilation of different variants and settings.

name: Haengbulhaeng: Haengbogui Sijageun Jigeumbuteo
description: Sin descripción

name: 808s&Genetics
description: A puzzle game that combines nonogram and genetics rules.

name: Absolute Schafkopf for Windows 11
description: Schafkopf is a popular German card game and is played by young and old with great enthusiasm. "Absolute Schafkopf for Windows 11" is suitable for beginners and advanced players alike.

name: Train Simulator: Glasgow to Dunblane and Alloa Route
description: Experience the charm of Scotland and scenic diverse landscapes as you explore Glasgow to Dunblane and Alloa for Train Simulator from Thomson Interactive.

name: Glix
description: He just wanted to understand what was going on around him.

name: Girl Up
description: Embark on an exciting adventure in the heights, preventing the villain Vill from accomplishing his goal. Confront him, overcoming the condemnation of humanity. Don't stop, keep climbing, girl!

name: Eternal Damnation
description: Conquer, pillage and determine the fate of a fantasy world in Eternal Damnation, a hybrid real-time strategy RPG that places the ultimate power in the hands of the player. Fight back against a dominant evil or destroy it and take the world for yourself - the choice is yours.

name: Homebound
description: Tasked with finding humanity a new home, a lonely astronaut braves a desolate planet while making a fluffy friend along the way. homebound is a short 2D puzzle platformer that explores the feeling of home.

name: I Commissioned Some Cats 2
description: I paid artists to hide cats and wool in 15 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Kakuro
description: This is a pure Kakuro puzzle.

name: Kaikan
description: Kaikan is a vertical scrolling shooter that focuses on destroying enemies. Destroy enemies with 6 types of aircraft with different performance, clear 5 stages, and aim for a higher score.

name: Liquid Space
description: Fly and fight through the vibrant universe of Liquid Space Dimension in this retro-inspired action shooter! As Sid Seaburn, pilot of the Star Drifter, master a wide range mechanics like drifting, laser beams, and torpedoes to get the highest score possible and stop the evil general Ra-Baba!

name: Pass Problems
description: Puzzle game for the Playdate with a basketball theme.

name: Leafy Trails: Magic Tree
description: Immerse yourself in a world of enchantment and renewal as you guide the fox on its quest to rescue the ancient Great Tree. Unearth the magic of the forest, uncover its hidden gems, and weave your own story amidst the Leafy Trails.

name: WestQuest for Playdate!
description: Crank (to jump) around to find out best way to collect the gold. Over 30 levels of crankin' action!

name: Rainbow
description: Who are you. Where is this place. Find the secret in a rainbow-colored, monochrome world. Maybe this is all someone's dream.

name: TY the Tasmanian Tiger 4: Bush Rescue Returns
description: Explore a ripper new side of TY the Tasmanian Tiger with this fair dinkum, comic-style side scrolling adventure!

name: Mermaid Castle 2
description: Join the mermaid sisters in their new, underwater adventure!

name: RunnerSky
description: The lost soul wanders and runs aimlessly in the distant sky.

name: Redeemer's Run
description: Fight. Conquer. Reunite.

name: Aireo FlightSimulator
description: Are you ready for takeoff? Fasten your seatbelt and experience what it's like to be a pilot as you dive into the most breathtaking landscapes of this planet.

name: Roids
description: Explore a unique, procedurally generated galaxy filled with alien artifacts and resources to extract and exploit. Mine asteroids, harvest nebula, pilot unique ships and find new and strange things in the void between stars as you struggle to survive long enough to find another home.

name: Train Simulator: ÖBB 5081 Schienenbus
description: Climb into the cab of an Austrian rail legend with the ÖBB 5081 Schienenbus ‘railbus' from RSSLO.

name: Chain Reaction
description: Create your own custom chain reactions from scratch or try and explore a variety of set challenges.

name: First Up
description: Race to the summit with friends in "First Up" – the ultimate climbing showdown! Show off your skills, outsmart rivals, and use unique character abilities in this strategic, multiplayer adventure. Whether you're a pro climber or a newbie, it's time to conquer the heights and be "First Up"!

name: Ammo and Oxygen
description: Adrenaline shooter-roguelike with survival elements and suspense atmosphere. Try to unravel the mysteries, exploring stations, dungeons, canyons, swamps and permafrost, fighting alien creatures.

name: Posthaste
description: An arcade rally game.

name: Fusillade
description: Use your infinite deck of cards in real time to push back the never ending waves of pirates. Fly through a Roguelike, Arcade, Space Shoot em' up, and Destroy the Cosmos with unparalleled firepower, ingenuity, and a little bit of luck!

name: Halchemist
description: Tag-changing exploration action game in which two characters are operated alternately.

name: The Fairway Club
description: Grab your clubs and get to The Fairway Club now! We offer a relaxing golfing experience for any type of golfer. Hit one of our courses or driving ranges, located all around the world, in the morning, evening or night!

name: To The Mars
description: Are you ready to climb Mars just for fun? This is a concise game, nothing more. You can always repeat it, you learn from mistakes. It should be simple enough, good luck to everyone.

name: This is My Place
description: This is my place - This is a fantasy war game with simple gameplay but difficult survival. Players need to upgrade facilities to obtain more resources to defend their territory. In addition to wars, players can also gain more resources or morale by playing mini-games. So how many days can you last?

name: The Spectral Web: Hitodama
description: Explore a Labyrinth full of magic, monsters, and mystery in this dungeon crawler inspired by retro classics. Wield unique spells to battle enemies, break blocks, and uncover hundreds of secrets hidden within the Labyrinth's walls.

name: The Princess's Dragon
description: Traverse the winding dungeon of the dragon as you attempt to reverse the curse that has been set upon you by the cursed sword.

name: Total Vengeance
description: Fueling the desire for vengeance, players must survive against ghastly creatures, uncover the truth behind the gas station's abandonment, and confront their own inner demons. The choices made throughout the journey will shape their destiny, blurring the lines between redemption and revenge.

name: Steampunk Jigsaw Puzzles
description: Dive into a world of Victorian elegance and mechanical marvels. Discover steam-powered wonders while testing the limits of your puzzle-solving skills.

name: Hand Simulator: Aliens
description: Hand Simulator: Aliens is a multiplayer game where your mission is team survival. You either battle infected colleagues, saving the ship and crew, or sow chaos and death as an infected member.

name: Mazepocalypse
description: Choose your character and shoot through zombies in this retro dot-collecting maze arcade game for 1-4 players! Featuring multiple ways to play, tackle one of the game's 6 unique scenarios in Campaign mode, or shoot for the hi-score in Arcade mode!

name: Sniper Hunter Shooter
description: For game lovers seeking realism, Sniper Hunter Shooter is an experience not to be missed! Fight as a sniper in a post-apocalyptic world, create your strategy, and test your shooting skills.

name: Rainman
description: When the rain falls, evil lurks. The storm is just the beginning. Can you survive the night and rescue your child from the clutches of Rainman? Prepare for the most intense survival horror.

name: Multiplayer Platform Golf
description: A 3D golf game with platforming and online multiplayer.

name: FarmCraft
description: Roll up your sleeves and get to work and start building your farm now!

name: The Paper Trials
description: A first-person horror maze game. Hiding & Standing still is Death. Run or you are dead. Trapped in a realm of nightmarish mazes with your only hope of survival is to find all of the pages to the mysterious book and escape!

name: The Nascent Necromancer
description: When you're falsely accused of sorcery, corrupt inquisitors make you the object of a witch hunt. Now, sorcery might be the only way for you to survive.

name: Pixel Descent
description: Pixel Descent is an action rogue-lite in which you navigate a series of complex dungeons packed to the brim with monsters that want you dead. Sign the contract and descend into the deepest depths of the abyss knowing full well that you will definitely die there, it's just a matter of when.

name: Copperfields
description: Escape to the outside world! In this 2D precision platformer, you play as a potted plant controlling a robot, that you use as a vehicle, to find water. Explore the post-apocalyptic world of Copperfields, discover what happened to the human and robot civilizations, and find your new home.

name: The Impossible Tower
description: In Impossible Tower, a young boy with no particular skill has been transported back to the Medieval Times by a clumsy wizard. There he will find lots of adventures and fun while trying to reach the tower top in order to escape this zombie-infested and full-of-magic world!

name: Mechanization
description: Mechanization is a factory building game. Build huge production lines, utilizing an array of droppers, conveyor belts, smelters, upgraders & more! Upgrade the size of your factory & use factory modules to enhance your factory's efficiency.

name: Hive Jump 2: Survivors
description: Become an agent of vengeance in this bullet-heaven action roguelite! You are the lone survivor of your squad, on an alien planet with just your weapon, a jetpack, and the courage to keep fighting. Kill off alien swarms and transform their valuable guts into explosive upgrades and vital utilities.

name: Magical Hike
description: Welcome to the enchanting world of Magical Hike, a soothing and immersive walking simulator that invites you to embark on a tranquil journey through picturesque landscapes and captivating environments. Leave your worries behind as you explore breathtaking locations.

name: Miss Peach
description:
"Miss Peach" is a pixel stealth strategy puzzle game.
You will play the role of a police officer - Jing Shu, searching for your missing son. During the search process, you are caught up in a strange incident: you are trapped in the house of Duo. Here, investigate more truth while protecting yourself.

name: Keep Flip
description: Technical game that make you use your mind and skills by taking control of a vehicle named Tweely that flips with ease. Drive across a large number of challenges. Climb perilous obstacles, navigate water hazards, and play with bottles. Don't let the challenges dissuade you, by mastering Tweely, you can become an unstoppable driver and conquer every challenge.

name: Railgun 500
description: Only five hundred remain. Eradicate them. Railgun 500 is a first person bunker shooter where you take your last stand against an invading force with nothing but your chargeable railgun. Use the weapon well. It's all you've got.

name: S.A.B.A.H. (Sun As Biased As Harmony)
description: The bias between the sun and harmony will be shattered by the chosen one...

name: Clanswoman
description: It is a story about the adventure of two sisters who leave their quiet lives behind and embark on a journey of revenge due to some unfortunate events. Turn based adventure game.

name: Dominoes Colors
description: Dominoes Colors It is a puzzle relaxing game where you need to mix colors when put each piece on board. The mix result is the next step to solve the puzzle. The piece with a chequered flag is the last piece, your last mix of colors needs to be equal of it.

name: Eldritch Exterminators
description: Face the Eldritch hordes. You are a possessed gun, feeding on the souls of the dead. Grow your power and challenge the Eldritch Gods for Dominion over the Void. Slay the Forgotten Ones and harness Unspeakables in this Bullet Heaven, and escape the ties that bind.

name: Fishman's Last Stand
description: Brace yourself for a fight ahead, as humans set their sights on your land. Their unwavering determination fuels their pursuit, and they'll stop at nothing to claim it. Stand your ground with unwavering resolve, knowing that your defense holds the key to safeguarding your territory

name: Squid Squabble
description: Squid Squabble is a high-octane arena shooter where players fight over limited ink that allows them to respawn. Face off with 2-8 players online or locally, collecting single-use items to outplay your enemies and be the last team standing.

name: Killa
description: Killa is a 3D adventure mystery with multiple endings. Valhalla, our protagonist, seeks the killer of her mentor, a mentor she treasures like family, venturing to an unknown island. Discover the culprit on this enigmatic island and embark on a journey of revenge.

name: Test Lab Inc.
description: Customize your skills and rain hell upon the endless hordes of robots. Test Lab Inc. is a fast-paced game where you'll be constantly tweaking your abilities until you become the ultimate weapon of mass destruction and crush all the puny robots that dare cross your path.

name: The Adventures of Liam
description: Liam is going on an adventure! What could go wrong? Other than... You know, needing to save the world.

name: The Elder Tales
description: Prepare for a challenging adventure in this oldschool 2D action-RPG. Experience the nostalgic charm of retro graphics combined with modern gameplay solutions. With low computer requirements, immerse yourself in an intriguing story and explore a world filled with endless activities.

name: The Fall of Elements
description: The Fall of Elements is an action-adventure game set in an ancient dungeon. You are chosen by the Elements to find an evil enemy. Solve puzzles, explore a vast dungeon, overcome obstacles in your way and fight forbidden magic.

name: The Hallway: Escape Room
description: “The Hallway - Escape Room” is a story-based single player puzzle adventure game that will take you on a mind-bending journey to uncover the mysteries of a long-forgotten civilization and their gods discovered during an expedition. Will you face them?

name: The Hangman
description: After weeks of relentless searching, the Detective finally uncovers a critical clue that leads to an isolated location, unveiling the fate of the Hangman's victims. Can you make a getaway with your findings before it's too late?

name: Tensei
description: Experience facing the mind along with the peaceful Zen landscape.

name: Sunset of Ate
description: An open world TPS science fiction game

name: Sun-Rise.exe
description: Adventure through bizarre and intricately made levels in this 2D platformer game.

name: Sunland Hike
description: Unveil the tranquility of nature in this captivating walking simulator. Immerse yourself in the picturesque landscapes of Sunland, where every step leads to a new discovery. Your ultimate goal? Find hidden gems scattered throughout the terrain, each more breathtaking than the last. ️

name: Stimmings
description: Stimmings is a rogue like and real time strategy experience where units must be coerced into performing activities to snowball your colony into a winning state.

name: Stick Slasher
description: Stick Slasher is an epic 2D fighting game where you combat relentless waves of adversaries armed with shields, swords, or guns. Confront a range of enemy types, secure the highest scores, and ascend to the title of the ultimate warrior!

name: Simple Solitaire
description: Play the most basic and simple game of solitaire. This game follows the rules of TriPeaks.

name: Simple Snooker
description: This is a two-player Snooker game, that runs on computer desktop or virtual reality device.

name: Private Military Manager: Tactical Auto Battler
description: You are the CEO of a private military company. Recruit capable mercenaries, purchase weapons, and develop your mercenaries according to their roles and characteristics. Observe how your mercenaries perform in combat and plan your tactics to ensure mission success.

name: StellarEchoes: Terrain Explorer
description: StellarEchoes:TerrainExplorer is a terrain adventure and shooting battle game featuring spaceships and a target planet training ground. SteamVR needs to be set up to run with OpenXR.

name: Stab
description: Escape from the house of a crazy and chatty killer... Accomplish objectives and collect points... Get your name on the leaderboard.

name: StanÇact: Sexy Tenacious Girls
description: 『StanÇact』is a cute and sexy girl-on-girl Shoot'em up. Mai, a military officer, is on her way to quell a riot, but the rioters and the military have teamed up and are on the rampage and the head of the military was the ringleader.Witness one woman's struggle to complete her mission amidst the chaos!

name: Starstride
description: You need to decide the faction you are born into and fight for it, gradually becoming the most powerful Star Warrior. Power armor and energy core will be one of the most important cores that accompany players' growth. You can freely create your own mecha set and conquer the entire vast universe.

name: Spellslinger
description: Harness the power of the Elements and gather Spells to defend yourself against Hordes of Enemies!Dozens of different Spells with unique Functionality and Traits.Spells with the same Traits grant unique Abilities and Powers to aid you in your Battle.Stand your ground Wizard!

name: Snaky Survivor
description: Navigate the stark world of Snaky Survivor, an arcade game that pits you against starvation and challenges your survival instincts. Guide a snake-like character as it gathers soul fragments to stave off hunger, weaving through hazardous obstacles in a race against time.

name: Sneaky Peeky
description: Time for being stealthy! Dive into the shadows of Sneaky Peeky and experience real multiplayer stealth action. Use the environment to conceal your presence and avoid getting caught. Find ways to disrupt enemy team. Discuss your strategy and be sneaky!

name: Son of Perun Kharkiv
description: Son of Perun: Kharkiv is a first-person shooter in the setting of Kharkiv of the future and retrowawe.

name: Sorrow Asylum 2
description: Sorrow Asylum 2 is a looping horror game, a mix of an abandoned asylum and your mind's prison, as well as a sequel to Sorrow Asylum.

name: Space Dogo
description: Space Dogo is a platform/adventure game. Moro is an old trained dog searching across the galaxy for her owner who has been kidnapped after some enemy attack to the Human Colony.

name: Spectator 2
description: Welcome to the world of Spectator 2 – the sequel to the gripping horror game Spectator! Brace yourself for new levels of atmospheric terror and captivating surveillance, you'll face even more chilling events and dangers as you carefully monitor cameras and report any suspicious occurrences.

name: Race Manager
description: Become a race manager

name: Rescue Team: Mineral of Miracles
description: The extraordinary discovery of a mineral named "Immortalite" has sent shockwaves across the globe. Now you are tasked with uncovering the secrets of this powerful mineral and ensuring it doesn't fall into the wrong hands.

name: Shattered World
description: Play as the your sisters hero as you fight monsters along the way and make friends as well.

name: Sexy Ladies
description: Sexy Ladies is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Seybul Tech
description: Seybul Tech is a walking simulator. Navigate as an office employee, confronting peculiar encounters while in search of an exit from this enigmatic abyss.

name: Sex Story: Cuckold Life - Episode 5
description: A steamy Visual Novel featuring high-definition graphics and realistic-looking characters set in beautiful decor. The story continues with Nikki at the office getting cornered by her asshole of a Boss, then seduced into a wild quickie while her husband is on the other side of a glass wall.

name: Sex Play: The Sauna
description: A quick and dirty game made especially for your pleasure. Contains visual novel elements and a sex simulation part. You play the role of a man who goes to the sauna and receives a special treatment.

name: Search & Find: Hidden Objects
description: With beautifully detailed, hand-illustrated pictures by published puzzle artist Adam Doyle, Search and Find - Hidden Objects serves a relaxing adventure for everyone ready to perfect their spotting skills.

name: SCP-479: Shadows of the Mind
description: You are a Class D personnel on an experimental mission for the Foundation to investigate SCP-479. The facility is linked to anomalies affecting the human psyche, gradually driving them insane. Please remember to take your pills.

name: Ronshade
description: "Ronshade" is a turn-based roguelike game. Players collect items and challenge the depths. The turn system displays action results, with intuitive and quick controls. Over 100 unique items greatly influence combat outcomes.

name: Scarred
description: Scarred is a first-person atmospheric horror puzzle game where you must uncover the truth about one of your schoolmates before it’s too late. Traverse a world of nightmares inspired by nostalgic Singaporean architecture as you fight to survive.

name: ReactFuse
description: Master the power of two weapons at once and switch between other weapons strategically. Amp up the intensity by charging your weapon's bullets. Watch as your shots glow with power, ready to deliver devastating effects upon impact in our FPS multiplayer game.

name: Jewel BEM Hunter Lime
description:
A twelve episode series of short, low-interaction semi-animated episodic games by Silence. The series tell the story of Bass and Lime, two demonic creatures who assume human form and travel to Earth in order to retrieve stolen jewels from "big-eyed monsters" (BEMs). The anime Jewel BEM Hunter Lime is based on these games.

Once upon a month, a door behind the full moon opens. This door is between the human world and magical world. Now it just so happens that on one such night, Lime and Bass are in hot pursuit of a demon who had stolen six power gems from the magical world. The demon escapes to the human world through the open door, and the two follow. Now they must search for the six power gems, all of which have been scattered all over Tokyo. It's up to Lime and Bass to blend into with humans and find the gems.

name: Dough: A Crime Strategy RPG
description: Money, power, women, status... in the Prohibition, the world of crime is prospering. A Strategy RPG game where you start from the bottom and try to conquer the whole city, it would've been so easy too if you didn't have to fight pesky policemen, greedy politicians and ruthless competition.

name: Playroom Invasion TD
description: Playroom Invasion TD invites you to an exciting tower defense adventure set in a nursery filled with toy characters and towers. Take part in fun and tactical battles against evil toys trying to take over your room which is full of towers with different features.

name: Daisy Grotto
description: Daisy Grotto is a cozy, retro. and clever 2D role-playing adventure. Explore a magical world - Meet interesting characters, collect fun items, and fight fierce monsters in interactive turn-based combat! Develop your party and leverage their unique abilities to uncover the secrets of the Daisy Grotto.

name: Penguru
description: Penguru is a hack and slash game where you play as an angry Penguen. Choose your weapon from various options. Shoot, blow, cut and rip your way through waves of enemise. Reload and rest at the belly of a whale. As long as you present a Guru Level of Shooting you are welcomed at Penguru universe.

name: Nounishpunk
description: Nounishpunk is an exhilarating, fast-paced third-person comedy action-adventure shooter set in an open world, boasting a captivating fantasy futurism art style.

name: No Logic
description: No Logic is a puzzle platform game where you have to disable your logic in order to complete this game!

name: End of Space Project
description: Take command of a spaceship, try to get home. A science fiction adventure game.Weapons, crew, morally ambiguous actions and cats in spacesuits.

name: Bahamut and the Waqwaq Tree
description: Discover a once-thriving ocean, now tainted by enigmatic dark forces. Your quest: decipher the mystery and rekindle the ocean's radiant light.

name: Monstronomy
description: Monstronomy is a dark take on the timeless monster collecting genre. As you explore a cute world filled with quirky monsters and odd NPCs, a deep and sinister story unfolds with the discovery of found-films and unsettling glitches. This game is not suitable for individuals who are easily disturbed.

name: Deleted
description: Take control of a powerful drone and prepare to face off against hordes of enemies standing in your way. Collect currency and upgrade your drone with new weapons and skills. Are you ready for the ultimate challenge?

name: DJ Clicker: World Tour
description: This is a DJ's journey into light and sound. With the power at your fingertips to realise your dream. You can become a star.

name: HotDog TD
description: This is an awesome Tower Defense game that you need to protect the world from Alien 's invasion.

name: Belloncho Body Inspection
description: You are Nanako Hongou, a new transfer student to the all-girls school, St. Belloncho Academy. Hearing rumors of a sketchy body inspection taking place at the school infirmary, you decide to take it upon yourself to unearth the culprit, and expose the secrets of St. Belloncho Academy. Fight an eclectic cast of delinquents while going about your school life and solving mysteries.

name: Gold Rush Clicker
description: Dive into "Gold Rush Clicker," an idle clicker game where you start as a novice miner. Tap to mine gold, buy upgrades, and face strategic challenges. With procedurally generated levels, stunning graphics, and Steam achievements, it's an endless journey to become the ultimate mining tycoon!

name: Polymino
description: A fast-paced puzzle game for 1-4 players. Match blocks by color, build up combos and cause huge amounts of destruction!

name: Memory Patches
description: A visual short novel about a girl who wakes up in an empty apartment and tries to figure out what happened. In front of her are four boxes filled with different items from her past. Touching them, she recalls pieces of memories, but one of the items is cursed.

name: DeltaBlade 2700 Re:Create
description: Fight your friends as a cyberpunk robot ninja mercenary in DeltaBlade 2700 Re:Create, the remake of the original DeltaBlade 2700. It’s the same high energy, competitive local multiplayer brawler with fast paced sword combat and jetpacks you love, but with tons more features!

name: Mooselutions
description: Explore a puzzling forest full of cute (but pesky) moose who anger easily.

name: Floating Life Record
description: I found myself in a strange place filled with dangerous monsters, You must find a way to escape here and return to the real world, but before that, you need to collect materials, food, and weapons to ensure that you can survive here.

name: Dr. Lunatic Supreme With Steam
description: Smash monsters, collect brains, and so much more as you attempt to stop Dr. Lunatic's evil scheme. 1,200 levels and hundreds of hidden bonuses in Bouapha's greatest adventure! Now enhanced for Steam!

name: Peacemaker: Bloody Emperor
description: A dark fantasy JRPG. The imperial princess Chrysoberyl must fight the Bloody Emperor who has usurped the throne. However, her army is small and her allies are conniving. It is a bloody war where she will have to choose between peace and lives...

name: Hammer Bros
description: Hammer Dudes is a casual 2D platform fighter. Dodge, throw and strike with your hammer to defeat your opponent and reach their final scene! Play on the couch with a buddy or even online in this competitve and crazy 1v1 game.

name: Pea Pod Power
description: Explore a colorful garden world in this unique 3D platformer! An evil alien fungus has invaded the planet and seized control of its crops... use your epic Pea Pod Powers to defeat the fungus and recover the sacred seeds before it’s too late!

name: Night Poetry
description: Night Poetry is a rogue-lite, story-driven, RPG game, where your choices matter! Survive in your own manner and witness the game's response to your actions, whether it's fighting your way out or coming up with something to bewilder your enemies, as you explore this mysterious world...

name: Fishing Echoes
description: Step into the cozy realms of Fishing Echoes, a game that beckons you to shorelines filled with rare fish and whispered legends. Ready yourself for the ultimate angling challenge as you embark on a journey to mastery.

name: Brownie's Adventure
description: A fantasy point and click adventure in traditional 1990s style. Dark humour, player choices that have impact on your outcome and hours of daft shenanigans.

name: Ghost Hand
description: Ghost Hand is a game focused on combat and exploration, which follows the story of its protagonist, Iria with a non-linear progression. Iria is a young wizard apprentice who lives on the moon. Iria is on the hunt for her father, a long-lost powerful mage, while encountering all sorts of enemies.

name: Meow Planet
description: Welcome to "Meow Planet"! This is a light-hearted and enjoyable casual game where your mission is to find all the hidden feline inhabitants on a colorful and vibrant Meow Planet.

name: Oblivistar
description: Oblivistar is a story-driven adventure game where you will help solve a mystery that sinks into the place you call home.

name: Gridlock Gladiators
description: A real-time fast paced fighting game with deck building. Create your own unique characters, fight to collect new abilities and armor, and perform flashy combos to smash your opponent out of the ring in grid based combat!

name: Culinary Survivors
description: Food has revolted! Never-ending hordes of ingredients are after you. Fend them off in this casual, action game with a variety of decision making rogue-lite elements that influence your character build against the food army.

name: Chinese Pope Door
description: This is a role-playing game where the player can fight freely with the enemies. You can run and jump freely, use sword and dart to attack the enemies, and special attack to give the enemies a heavy blow. If you like Super Mario's style of operation, you must try this game.

name: Stories One
description: Welcome to Stories One: an exciting pre-alpha game blending FPS and MOBA genres. Embark on thrilling 5v5 battles in a 90's retro-futuristic city. Strategically build your deck, level up, and conquer your foes. Join the Stories One arena today!

name: CyberPigeon
description: Take control of CyberPigeon, the ultimate cybernetic avian warrior, as you engage in intense battles against swarming drones and formidable bosses. Adapt to the ever-changing environment, collect power-ups and weapons, and rise to the top of the leaderboard in this thrilling aerial showdown.

name: Island Master
description: Build, manage, and thrive in Island Master! Procedural islands, resource control, citizen happiness. Become the ultimate Island Master in this top-down city builder.

name: Priscillas Dream
description: In this Top-Down RPG game, players find themselves stranded in a vast and unforgiving desert, facing challenges and obstacles at every turn. The game begins with the player character waking up in the middle of the desert, surrounded by a small group of survivors who are also struggling to survive.

name: Cleaning Time VR
description: Clean up your virtual world with "Cleaning Time VR", a fun and immersive game that challenges you to clear away the clutter! Use your skills and special virtual tools to reign victorious as you scrub, wash, and mow your way to success.

name: Potions & Emotions
description: Potions and Emotions is a creative game where you play the conscience of the villain. Join Thalia—a fae with big ambitions—who intends to take over a town hidden in a magical forest. Whether her shoulder angel or devil, you get to guide her actions and witness the consequences of your choices.

name: Persevera
description: Intoxicated by the philosophy of absurdity of Albert Camus, you wake up malnourished in a torn medical scrub with a suitcase handcuffed to your left arm and thousand open questions. In your pursuit of truth and answers, you encounter various daring quests, technical riddles and hazardous chases.

name: FireKrackers
description: Grab a firecracker and try to clean up the board as quick as possible. You can chain-destroy similar blocks together, use different kinds of firecrackers and rockets.

name: Ashes of Arcanum
description: This is a simple engine created based on the TTRPG Ashes of Arcanum.

name: Inhibit
description: "Inhibit" is an exhilarating and highly challenging speed run platform game that will put your reflexes to the ultimate test. Each level is more demanding than the previous one, and the slightest mistake will determine the difference between victory and defeat.

name: Ghost Member
description: 【Ghost Member】is a single-player ghost investigation horror adventure game. You investigate ghosts in a house where a member of the occult research club who went missing was investigating. The story progresses by using multiple items to find traces left by the ghost and identify the type of ghost.

name: Mutation Madness
description: Mutation Madness invites you to a thrilling virus-blasting challenge! Armed with your disinfectant gun, defeat waves of mutating viruses and save Cell City from the Madvirus outbreak! Upgrade your gun and use powerful items, while unraveling information about the virus.

name: Metal Exile
description: Leap, grapple, and blast your way through monsters and hazards in this retro 2D action-platformer. Explore, buy upgrades, and equip different suits and weapons to survive a variety of hazards and ultimately escape from Exile.

name: Charon's Crossing
description: A mythological arcade-style game where you navigate Charon through the rivers of the Underworld. Dodge obstacles, confront adversaries, and strategize with Hermes' power-ups. Delve into a pixel-art world inspired by ancient legends.

name: Golel
description: Golel, a first person roguelike Dungeon Crawler.Combat is focused on mobility and using the environment to your advantage.Dropping book shelves on an enemy, or kicking an enemy into a trap are all valid tactics.Deep skill/magic and combat gameplay, with many development paths.

name: Ghost Vanguard
description: Ghost Vanguard is a Beat'em Up game that combines stylish action with roguelike elements. Grab your sword and step into treacherous evil dungeons, using stylish and magnificent combos to defeat the sinister forces from the darkness!

name: Nasty Rogue 2
description: An open-world crafting roguelike voxel based where everything is destructible and randomly generated, daylight is for exploring, mining rare minerals, forging powerful weapons, and building your fortress. As the sun sets, monsters emerge to attack your base.

name: Ember the Werefox
description: Resourceful by day, fierce by night; young Ember must survive and redeem the nightmare forest.

name: Listenbourg
description: Play a sci-fi turn-based strategy game while an AI threat the humanity. A VR experience allowing to discover the famous Listenbourg.

name: At Winter's End
description: At Winter's End is a cozy narrative dice-rolling RPG about 12-year-old Noel growing up in the forest of spirits. Explore the forest and complete quests while rolling dice to see how Noel responds to the challenges they face.

name: Hidden Cats in Rome
description: Mamma mia! Our cats are now in the great city of Rome! Let's find them! Start with a monochromatic illustration and reveal the final colored art. Play through different modes, find special cats, and unlock bonus levels! More than 970 hidden objects to find! Enjoy the extra bonus level, NERD ARENA!

name: Dreams of a Geisha
description: Journey through the wonderful world of Geisha. Help Ichisumi to reopen the temples and restore a world of beauty and passion.

name: Forge & Fortune
description: Craft weapons, tools, and armor pieces in stunning detail as you fulfill orders from a variety of NPCs. Use VR to hammer, chisel, and mold materials into exquisite creations. Expand your shop, hire assistants, and unlock new techniques with your earnings.

name: Circular Logic Games
description: Chess, checkers, hexagon, other board games on round board, network or offline.

name: Noga
description: Noga is a single-player shooter/driver, RPG, where an alien invasion of Earth has just begun. As you try to save your friend from the hands of the aliens, you uncover the real reason that brought them to Earth.

name: Arctic's Adventure
description: An action adventure game where you go on a journey to save your missing best friend. Play as Arctic the polar bear and explore the icy north in different ways. Meet new friends, overcome obstacles, and find clues about what happened to your friend.

name: Obesity Simulator
description: Obesity Simulator boils down to "eating smart", you are at the mercy of your own choices ....... and maybe also the food flying straight at you. Eat to survive, but be wary of what and how much you eat.

name: Emberrush
description: Immerse yourself in a fabulous atmosphere in Emberrush! You have to fight off waves of enemies that are heading towards your settlement.

name: Psycholog
description: As a psychologist, manage your clients' phobias while confronting a serial killer. This horror game blends dialogue in the style of a visual novel with first-person point-and-click elements.

name: Knight Speed
description: Embark on an epic medieval adventure in this fast-paced endless runner. As a valiant knight, leap across perilous towers, skillfully shoot down enemies with your trusty bow, and protect your kingdom while racing against the relentless passage of time.

name: Live Shiver
description: In this game, YOU are the game, and a popular streamer plays it! Step into the shoes of an evil force in this real-time strategy simulation game. Craft tension, conjure scares, and haunt the streamer to create a symphony of horror. Your goal: Amplify the stream to increase the number of live viewers

name: Electron Flux
description: A circuit-themed tower defense game: Build circuits that can survive the onslaught of electrical bugs. Discover new enemies, research new and upgraded towers, and protect increasingly complex circuit paths.

name: Beaten Path
description: Beaten Path is a turn-based, tactical RPG following the story of a mage and her student as they traverse a shattered world, fend off foes, and strategize their way to victory.

name: Courier 79
description: Drive across towns and countries and become the elite courier, a courier who delivers cargo in perfect condition ranging from food all the way to contrabands. In this Rogue-like experience you will be forced to show your endurance, skill and speed in order to succeed.

name: Castle of Void
description: Your main goal is to defend the castle, because the enemies will stop at nothing. Do not let them break through the defense, as their ambition is to capture your fortress and gain power over your kingdom.

name: Escapeland
description: Welcome to the world after the global flood. Join Nikolaj, a man with no past, on his journey through the Valley of Life. Guided by fate, he finds himself caught in the struggle between diverse clans, all vying for power over the remnants of humanity. You have to choose a side in this struggle...

name: Battle for Treasure
description: How many secrets and dangers lie in the vast expanses of the oceans and seas! In just one look at the immense waves, a spark of a thirst for adventure, a desire for wealth and fame is hidden in the very soul of every Viking.

name: Horny Sweeper
description: Horny Sweeper is a turn-based strategy game. The player begins the game with Kazuya and Henry alone, but afterwards more and more girls join the party. Most of the battles are against government parties, which consist of various character classes (soldiers, mages, robots, etc.). The player's party also acquires different talents over the course of the game: a healer, a shotgun-wielding character, etc. When characters attack each other, an animated sequence is displayed.

name: Dominant Witches
description: Dominant Witches is a visual interactive story for adults, where the player will study in a magical institution and will perform sexual fetishes with beautiful witches, attractive kitsune, cute vampires and pretty kitsune who live in a castle among the woods.

name: Buti
description: Buti is an RPG currently in development that delves deep into the expansive world of the internet and a little beyond, creating a parallel universe strongly inspired by the 2000s. Here, you assume the role of a unique character and embark on a journey towards online success.

name: Naturpark Lillebælt VR
description: Dive into VR missions at Naturpark Lillebælt. Plant eelgrass, catch fish, clean trash, and learn about biodiversity. Restore the ocean's balance in this educational adventure!

name: Go for a Punch! Saki Sanobashi
