description: Four students find themselves trapped in the restroom of an abandoned school; the door is locked, and there's no way out except to cling to hope or face death.

name: Epic Roller Coasters: Yellowstone
description: Ride between mammoths and saber-toothed tigers and survive in the Stone Age.

name: Delineation
description: The 3D dot-connecting puzzle game.

name: Pudding
description: "Let's defeat the demon lord together!" A thrilling action-adventure of destruction!

name: Frontline: World At War
description: Victory awaits those who can adapt and seize the upper hand in this thrilling war game. Can you reshape history and lead your forces to glory?

name: Avengers Squad
description: "Avengers Squad" is a bullet hell shooting game. You, an unknown avenger, although you have the martial arts secrets passed down from your ancestors, but after all, the disputes in the rivers and lakes make you want to stay away from the fights in the rivers and lakes and wander around~

name: A-Mazing 3D
description: This game teaches patience, balance and precise movement. Your objective is to try to tilt the playing field up, down, left and right to guide the marble to the end of the maze without letting it fall into any of the holes. The closer you get to the finish, the higher your score becomes.

name: Elemental Escape
description: Bullet hell, but kill the bullets instead of dodging them!

name: Benderman VR
description: Benderman VR - A retro pipeline puzzler! Bend pipes in VR, beat the clock and collect wrenches while staying under the pipe budget. Nostalgic 80s-90s style.Will you be a Plumbing Maestro or a Drenched Dabbler?

name: Dysmantle: Pets & Dungeons
description: Befriend a pet, and together solve the numerous dungeons to discover the secret behind the island. There's a furry friend for everyone!

name: Adrift in the Backrooms
description: Adrift in the Backrooms is a adventure multiplayer game that is a mix of backrooms games and more traditional co-op.

name: Battle Stations Blockade
description: Arm the turrets and take aim as you take command of a gunboat in dangerous waters! Battle Stations Blockade is an intense 3D rail shooter presented in voxel style.

name: Happy Place Remake
description: Happy Place: Explore the wonders of imagination at the new des-located Happy Land. Wonder through the abandon building in search of your old high school friend. Embark on a journey and meet slimo and his friends. Find a weapon, find your friend.

name: Fire Breakout
description: Fire breakout is a fire-themed simulation game, which aims to restore the real daily fire scene, through the fire phenomenon in the game scene, with the help of tools, players can judge and deal with fire accidents.

name: Backrooms: Infinite Halls
description: Backrooms: Infinite Halls is a game about investigating and researching the Backrooms, going deeper and deeper down these unending spaces, roaming their halls and avoiding their horrors.

name: God Within VR
description: "God Within VR" invites you into a riveting VR journey of destiny and mastery. Discover your true identity while battling formidable foes across diverse arenas. With a vast array of weapons and challenges, dive in, sharpen your abilities, and ascend in "God Within VR".

name: Just Click the Button
description: In "Just Click The Button," you do indeed, click on a button. The more you click, the more the game evolves. Select new abilities that align with your playstyle. Decide whether to attempt to beat the game after reaching a certain threshold or play indefinitely!

name: JDM Euphoria
description: Feel the rush of '90s Japanese underground street racing. Trick out and trade cars, pimp your garages, and go head-to-head in sprints and drags. Carve your path to glory and make your mark in this immersive game!

name: Pasture: The Livestock Simulator
description: The weight of your herd rests on your shoulders as you build a cattle empire, set in the Australian Outback.

name: Horizon's Mirage
description: Horizon's Mirage is a exhilarating first-person parkour set in a futuristic cityscape surrounded by skyscrapers. Progress through checkpoints, conquer dynamic obstructions, explore alternative paths and gather collectables to unlock time reduction, dashing, teleporting and more.

name: Immortal Mantis: Revenge
description: Know two sides of the same story while solving riddles, committing crimes and trying to survive the serial killer. On one side, a murderer with a mysterious objective, on the other, a detective with a sense of injustice who seeks to arrest him. Not necessary to know the story of the first game.

name: Bounce Trials
description: Patience and timing are key Bounce Trials, where you are a perptually bouncing ball that bounces through levels to reach a goal. Your only influence over the ball is to move either left or right. Compete against the clock and earn Gold, Silver, and Bronze rewards based on your completion time.

name: Dragon Nexus
description: Engage in pulse-pounding combat that hones your abilities. Ride majestic dragons, command their powers, and turn the tide of battle. Reach for the skies and forge an unbreakable bond in a world of danger and beauty. Your destiny beckons in Dragon Nexus.

name: Grimoire of Syvnta
description: Use the cards of common creatures to legendary heroes that inhabit Syvnta to fight your opponent. The goal is to defeat your opponent using your spells and units cards to their best potential.

name: Extermination Overdrive
description: Extermination Overdrive is a multiplayer shooter set on space stations. It features the Resilience Mechanic: every time you're defeated, you come back stronger. More hitpoints. More firepower. Every defeat is a step towards your next victory.

name: Mana Expel
description: Mana Expel is a fast-paced action platformer with stealth elements where in the near future magic has just been discovered, and those who master its power are feared like gods. Infiltrate their reign, be fast and unseen, exploit their own territory, and expel these so-called gods from their throne.

name: Jet Up
description: Jump with jetpack!. only you need to do is go up! the only thing you need is your skill!

name: Crib
description: It's time to face! As Milton, your past invites you to solve the mysteries. What you learn about yourself will surprise you. Most importantly remember that this is not a nightmare, this is a reality.

name: Long Story Short
description: Long Story Short is a funny and erotic adult game about a young man who finally decides to explore life beyond his computer screen. Follow him as he retells his experiences to a mysterious girl. Choose what kind of sexual person he will become. A new world of sexual debauchery awaits you.

name: OA Family
description: OA Family, a game with learning and relaxation. The main system of the game is to bring the popular English vocabulary game Hangman to do in a player-friendly format with a helper.

name: Laruaville 3
description: Summer, Winter, Spring and Autumn aren't functioning properly, so you have to use your Match3 skills to get it fixed. Build a town to recreate rain,snow,clouds and more.

name: Guidelicious
description: A short, interactive visual novel about waking up in a strange room with a mysterious man. But why are you here? Let Him be your Guide to the truth.

name: Avoid the Police
description: This is a very fun escape game with a touch of parkour in it.

name: Dream #46
description: Chill exploration, contemplative ride game with a boat.

name: Just the Two of Us
description: Just the Two of Us is a 3DCG visual novel made using the Ren'py about the budding feelings between a boy and a girl that meet for the first time in a post-apocalyptic world. A story-rich game with plot twists and multiple endings

name: Dungeons and Female Teachers
description: As a female teacher, you found a crack leading to a different world in the classroom. You entered the different world through the crack. You found that there are many dangerous creatures in the different world. In order to protect the school from being invaded, you decided to destroy these monsters.

name: Mockingbird
description: Mockingbird is a top-down stealth puzzle game. Play as the Mockingbird as you traverse 5 levels, culminating with a fight against an evil warrior!

name: Lost & Found Agency: Collector's Edition
description: Play this great new hidden objecft game from AVI Games. Get and fullfill orders from the detective agency “Lost & Found Agency” to search for missing objects. Go to fascinating locations and explore dangerous places, decipher clues and uncover secrets. Find the missing objects and solve crimes.

name: Click Here
description: Hmm, looks like you've clicked here. Now, it's time to click even more. Train your reflexes and test your mental stability, as you Click Here.

name: Axis Football 2024
description: Axis Football is a simulation-style football game featuring the industry's best franchise mode, massive customization, and realistic gameplay.

name: Jump Like a Grad Student
description: Smith, lingering as a graduate student for 20 years, hears of a rumor about an island where room-temperature superconductors were found. This is his last ray of hope. Help him ascend to the peak of the island and turn his life around. "Jump, Like a Grad Student"

name: Color Splash: Birds
description: Color Splash: Birds is a charming and relaxing puzzle game that will lift your spirits and take You into the world of adorable birds and art. Venture into the gallery, where you will find many extraordinary and colorful birds paintings.

name: AfterWar
description: AfterWar is a strategy about Ukraine in July 2024.

name: Escape Room: Romy Project
description: Escape Room: Romy Project is a first-person room escape game. Players need to collect clues and solve problems to escape.

name: Clarent Saga: Mana Chapter 0
description: A short RPG with great action battles, graphics and music inspired by the Mana Series.A great entry point for newcomers!

name: Dead Ground Arcade: Ellis Island
description: Now you can visit Ellis Island. You have to survive on the small bridges there. If you succeed in surviving until the final stage, you may face much more stronger walker. Guess who?

name: Ducks Can Drive: Penguins Can Too
description: After the ducks taught the penguins how to drive, they are now comfortable enough to face the ducks in racing! With this DLC you will be able to drive as a penguin on top of your standard duck choices. Who will win, Ducks or Penguins? Penguins Can Drive Too!

name: Dark Lovers: Extended Edition
description: Dark Lovers is a short pixel art teenage romantic mistery visual novel game about a highschool prom night in 1979 which contains multiple endings and secrets.

name: Pop Off 2
description: Unleash fizzy chaos in "Pop Off 2"! Ascend the crater by flying between obstacles in this physics based platformer. Discover what mysteries this foreign landscape holds as you team up with friends, customize your character, and conquer the precarious unknown in this thrilling multiplayer adventure.

name: Home Restoration VR
description: Grab your tools, put your creative hat on, and get ready to restore, renovate, and create beautiful homes in Home Restoration. This game has been downloaded nearly 100 million times on mobile devices and now it’s available on VR! It’s time to bring old houses back to life and make dreams come true!

name: Lizards Must Die
description: The great exploits of the Ancient Rus in the war with the lizards. Immerse yourself in the world of Hyperborea and defeat hordes of Lizards and other unholy who encroached on holy places Ancestors. Choose a blessed hero and go save the world from the green plague.

name: EmyLiveShow: Hentai Puzzle Game
description: As the "story unfolds" between unique puzzle-like images, Amy, Nia, Uma, and Six will appear before the player for the first time in more innocent and yielding forms, drawing closer by revealing their classic outfits, and fully opening up in latex fetish BDSM attire.

name: Mow VR: Challenge Your Limits
description: Mow VR is a wave-based simple shooting game. This is designed to be easily enjoyed by new VR users and light gamers. No need to reload, just keep on defeating the oncoming enemies. It's so exhilarating. Defeat the enemies, earn stars, unlock weapons, and challenge your limits!

name: Cargobros
description: Cargobros is a co-op game with chaos breeding physic mechanics. You can hook yourself, your cargo and your vehicle in this game. In a world with absolute physic chaos, use your hook to create order! Coming soon...

name: Mountain Bicycle Rider Simulator
description: Are you ready to experience the thrill of cycling on snowy mountain peaks? Mountain Bicycle Rider Simulator invites you to an unforgettable adventure with realistic graphics. Now explore and pedal to the top!

name: Grand Prix Circus 2
description: A grand prix racing game which happens in (simple) 3D and allows you to significantly customize your car.

name: Crazy Plus
description:
"Crazy Plus" is a numbers merged puzzle game.
This game provides six modes: Plus One, Match Two, Add Three, Merge Seven, Make Ten and 2N. Each mode has a unique gameplay.

name: IdleDev
description: Dive into software development, face an irksome boss, rake in cash, chug energy drinks, and remember—no rage quitting allowed! Welcome to the untamed world of corporate code crafting.

name: Mimi the Cat: Meow Together
description: Help Mimi and her friends move, climb, or carry boxes to reach their beds and rest. Alone or in multiplayer, unlocking adorable new cats and being able to play with them in this challenging sokoban-like game!

name: Logic
description: Logic is a 3D logical platform game, where you can get through the levels by solving several different puzzles with the help of moveable cubes, by switching buttons and pressure plates, and by using elevators and teleporting platforms.

name: Castle Guardian
description: Legendary action with tower defense warfare! Become a castle guard in fantastic medieval era! Destroy the enemies with your wingman Centaur. Defend your castle!

name: Girl Gallery
description: Girl Gallery - relaxing casual puzzle game for adults. Complete levels and expand your gallery collection.

name: Improbability Control Bureau
description: Immerse yourself in a chilling, X-Files-inspired horror game where you monitor live surveillance cameras, spotting and addressing anomalies. From eerie furniture shifts to unexpected intrusions, report anomalies to correct them and survive the night using your keen eyes and memory. Trust no1.

name: Exciting Milk
description:
Humanity is prospering through the expansion of the Earth's development, but natural destruction has also become extreme.

One day Amon, a scientist who opposed the destruction of nature, decided to return to the Earth 150 years earlier via time machine and protect nature.

You follow a time cop from the future, Milk, and an introverted high school girl named Kurumi, who are forced to share the same body by a strange turn of events. They must stop an eco-terrorist named Amon, who creates monsters from plants.

This series of short VNs is very short, being constituted of two mere episodes, for a total playtime barely reaching 20 minutes. Nevertheless, it may have the best animated sequences you'll ever see on PC-98. Too bad it was canceled so quickly, it certainly had some potential.

name: An Engineer and the Great Machine
description: An Engineer and the Great Machine is a Bureau-punk Puzzle Game. Freshly hired and assigned to the new company project "The Great Machine", design, test and improve the systems that power "The Great Machine" and debug the strange outputs the keep producing...

name: Dear Brother
description: Point and click adventure game series! The game consists of 12 gradually releasing chapters. Mystery and mystical story about young doctor and his family is waiting for you. Solve puzzles and uncover the mystery of the Blake family.

name: My Little Blood Cult: Let's Summon Demons
description: Embark on a demonic fishing adventure in My Little Blood Cult! Combine skill with luck to master a unique fishing mechanic and collect demons, creatures, and more to fill out your oddities cabinet and become the most powerful cult.

name: Aenigma Game: Storm Hacker
description: Jump on a futuristic hover-ski to drift, boost, leap, dash, sign-ride, and even hack your way through mysterious reality storms on an emotional journey across the stars in this high-speed 3D Action Adventure Platformer with immersive hub worlds and hand painted art.

name: Parkside: Decayed Soul Manipulation
description: Parkside is an FPS-Immersive Sim that chronicles the future of biomechanical subterfuge and suffering. Shoot, hack, and either save or sour the future of humanity in the dismally attractive and dystopian city of Abbotsford, California in the awful year of 2038. Will you serve the Divine Rod?

name: Dave's Fun Algebra Class: Remastered
description: Return to Dave's school in this brand new version of Dave's Fun Algebra Class! Solve math problems, meet Dave's friends, and uncover the secrets of Dave's school.

name: Plinko: Ball Falling
description: Classic Plinko game with new theme and challenges.

name: Egyptian Ratslap
description: Enjoy a laid-back session of your new favorite card game that mixes the rules of slap jack and more!

name: Modern Air Combat: Beyond Visual Range
description: Fire long range missiles and fly through mountains in close aerial combat to fight in PvP with friends or against bots in huge 400 km x 400 km world.

name: Idol vs Furries
description: Survive to Furries, and Farm Skins, in stylized gunfights.

name: Electronics Puzzle Lab
description: Enter the most advanced challenge laboratory of today's games, where electronics and logic merge into challenges that will captivate your mind and awaken the engineer within you!

name: My Virgin Roommate
description: You are a freshman, in love with your roommate. Live through five days at Virginia College and take away her innocence. Mia is waiting for you.

name: Dashbounce
description: Dashbounce is a 2D Speedrunning Puzzle-Platformer about going fast and intentionally abusing physics quirks! Seek the goal in each level before the clock hits zero - but watch out, you can't jump! You'll have to use your surprising speed and bouncy body to turn every object and obstacle into an advantage!

name: Mayhem Brawler II: Best of Both Worlds
description: A perfect fuse of '90s arcade vibe and modern rogue-lite / RPG mechanics in a time transition-themed beat 'em up. Play solo or online with friends and shape the story through your choices. Be amazed by the hand-drawn comics-inspired art, frame-by-frame animated characters, and kick-ass soundtracks.

name: Inertia Ball
description: This is an unusual adventure future simulation space game, in different gravity under your operation will also change. Players can feel the vastness of different planets in the game, feel different gravity, feel their own different operations. Conquer the universe!

name: Interballistic Symphony
description: A musical, fast-paced indie game all about speed and swift thinking. Navigate through tricky environments, use powerups to your advantage, push your skills to the limit and become the next interballistic master.

name: MGCM Combat Edition
description: A secondary creation fighting game which you can battle with attractive characters, magical girls, and demons from "I Am Magicami". There are three basic attack buttons, A, B, and C. Elements for beginners are also substantial. Let's grab the victory with flashy magic using the "Possibility Gauge"!

name: All Noobs Must Die
description: A place where wishes come true! You just need to protect the obsidian portal from zombies. Mine resources with your pickaxe, build traps, and put them to use — let them grind the zombies into a juicy green porridge! Funny meme endings!

name: Dadoo: Twists, Turns, and Mischiefs
description: Dadoo: Twists, Turns, and Mischiefs is an online multiplayer snake and ladder game with superpowers and lots of mischief! Change the course of the game with various skill cards. Push your enemy to their demise. Really, don't be nice while playing this game.

name: Hundred Fires: The Rising of Red Star - Episode 3
description: Prepare for the climactic finale as Montenegro returns for one last mission. Use your stealth skills to rescue your beloved daughter, Merche, and unravel the trilogy's thrilling conclusion amidst intense action and suspenseful gameplay!

name: Gage
description: Gage is a roguelike where you ascend the tower of Gage. Your goal is to fight through monsters to the get to top of the tower, where you must confront the Dark Lord Mick Albert. Along your way you can recruit allied to help you in your journey and grab whatever items you find to help you.

name: I Got Trapped in the Succubus's Dream!
description: The protagonist, trapped in the succubus's dream, cannot wake up. The only way to escape is to navigate through the traps set within the dream and find the exit. If you fall into a trap, you must start over to escape. Escape from the dream and make your getaway.

name: Global Conflict: The Trading Card Game
description: Build, battle, and conquer your way to victory in Global Conflict - The Trading Card Game! Assemble decks with strategic precision and engage in fierce turn-based battles against rival factions. Each move and decision will shape the course of the game, offering endless challenges and triumphs.

name: As Long As It's Not Illegal: Last Act
description: Many revelations will be realized as Roxanne's year the the crew comes to an end in the finale of this episodic trilogy.

name: The Case of the Golden Idol: Complete Edition
description:
Additional content included:
- The Lemurian Vampire
- The Spider of Lanka
- Soundtrack

name: Goblin's Mystic War
description: The game is a story driven action adventure game in an stylized cartoonish world. It is fun to play and a good experience that you will enjoy. Interact with other goblin's solve small puzzles and fight ghosts.

name: KnockedDown
description: Race as a cop, take down criminals in this thrilling low-poly game. Fast action, challenging obstacles. Join the chase!

name: Golfing in Aether: Deluxe Edition
description: Includes the base game and the Golfing In Aether - Deluxe Edition Upgrade.

name: Golfing in Aether: Leviathan
description: The third free expansion to Golfing in Aether, adding several new levels.

name: Golfing in Aether: Autumn
description: The first free expansion to Golfing in Aether, introducing autumn colors along with several new levels.

name: Beullokgwa Miyeonsiwa Godae Geuriseu
description: A chaotic educational game set in ancient Greece!Become the fictional philosopher Epistemonos and defeat the scholars who stand in your way!Drag blocks to merge them and defeat the enemies.Immerse yourself in a topsy-turvy story set in ancient Greece, with a focus on the Acropolis.

name: Forest Football
description: Car football game with multiplayer.

name: Seaman 3DS
description: A cancelled Seaman game for the Nintendo 3DS, which was in development by the original creator, Yoot Saito, in a close partnership with Satoru Iwata (president of Nintendo at that time). It was eventually cancelled. After Iwata's passing, Yoot Saito commented about the game and how he regrets not fulfilling this project.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Guilty Gear 25th Anniversary: Appreciation Color Pack
description: This color pack unlocks colors for the initial roster of 15 characters, as well as the 9 characters from Season Pass 1 and Season Pass 2, for a total of 24 characters. There is 1 color for every character, making for 24 extra colors available.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Guilty Gear 25th Anniversary: Special Additional Color Pack
description: This color pack unlocks colors for the initial roster of 15 characters, as well as the 9 characters from Season Pass 1 and Season Pass 2, for a total of 24 characters. There are 2 colors for every character, making for 48 extra colors available.

name: Young Justice: Legacy
description: A port of Young Justice: Legacy for Wii, which was cancelled due to quality issues and low interest from retailers.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Season 3 Character Additional Colors
description: An additional color pack including 6 colors for the 4 additional characters of GGST Season 3 (total of 24 colors).

name: 5 Nights at Guillem's
description: Videogame like Five Nights at Freddy's but with the company of Guillem the Frutem and some of his friends.

name: Project CARS
description: A version of Project CARS which would run on lower-end hardware. The PS3 and Xbox 360 ports were cancelled in favor of the PS4 and the Xbox One, but the Wii U version was only cancelled later.

name: 10 Second Backdoor
description: 10 Second Backdoor is a speed/reaction-based puzzle game where you guide humans toward doors scattered around levels.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Season Pass 3
description:
An exciting season pass that includes 4 additional playable characters, stages and season 3 pass bonus character colors as additional DLC for the Guilty Gear -Strive- game.

Season Pass 3 includes 4 characters, 2 stages and 2 color packs for the new characters. The first pack unlocks 6 color variations, including the ultimate edition colors, and the exclusive second pack unlocks extra colors 13-15, which are the 3 anniversary color variations.

name: Occultic;Nine: New World
description: Sin descripción

name: Sengoku Night Blood
description: Sengoku Night Blood was a Japanese free-to-play otome game, developed as a collaboration between Marvelous Entertainment, Kadokawa, and Idea Factory's Otomate. It was released in Japan on May 29, 2017, for Android and iOS devices. A 12-episode anime television series adaptation by Typhoon Graphics aired between October 3 and December 26, 2017. A Nintendo Switch port of the game was planned, but it was announced on October 24, 2019 that the Switch port was cancelled along with the mobile game being discontinued on December 25, 2019.

name: 63 Little Pieces
description: 63 Little Pieces is a puzzle game about the emotional journey of filling the void. A game about loss and hopefully finding clarity.

name: Banjo-Kazooie: Grunty's Curse
description: Banjo-Kazooie: Grunty's Curse was the cancelled Game Boy Color incarnation of what would eventually become Banjo-Kazooie: Grunty's Revenge.

name: Dynaforce
description: "In the classic FPS style, Dynaforce combines tactics and marksmanship. You'll collaborate with your team to devise strategies and take down enemies, participating in intense battles on various maps."

name: Untamed Tactics: Digital Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Fall of Elena Temple
description:
Fall from a ledge, collect the coins below, then undo back to where you fell from, with the coins in your pocket! An old-school puzzle platformer in which you explore rooms, avoid perils and collect all coins to progress. Missed some coins? Fall, collect, undo! Falling into some spikes? Undo!!

Test your forward thinking and logical skills. Plan your falls carefully, as your undos are limited. If you're not paying attention, you'll find yourself unable to restore back to the top, with coins still needing collecting!

Enjoy the retro aesthetics with monochrome pixel art, playing the game on the state of the art handheld GrimBoy (TM) (wink). Reminisce about the good times with lovely pixel art backgrounds to put you right back into your childhood bedroom, the backyard, the park, grandma's living and many more.

description: This mod is challenging. It has the traffic in every map, features, a lot of map subversions and custom items

name: Sonic and the Gunslinger
description: Sonic and the Gunslinger is a mod for Sonic Robo Blast 2 inspired by the Sonic storybook games and with a Wild West theme.

name: The Outer Zone: Survival Tactics
description: Lead a caravan of survivors through a world on the brink of collapse. Scavenge for resources, form bonds with your fellow survivors, and make difficult choices in this turn-based strategy roguelite. Will you survive long enough to reach the Outer Zone?

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2: Frontiers Adaptation Project
description: Sonic Robo Blast 2: Frontiers Adaptation Project is a mod project that aims to adapt the Sonic Frontiers open-zone formula into Sonic Robo Blast 2.

description: The game's premise was to have the player be a security guard tasked with monitoring a CCTV. The game was cancelled when the developers could not find a publisher that supported its unique concept.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization Revolution
description: Experience the journey of a civilization's birth to it's rise of power. Learn new technologies, conquer your foes, meet great people, and build Wonders of the World.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization Revolution
description:
Build. Discover. Conquer. Rule the World!

Lead your civilization from the dawn of man to the modern age and beyond in Sid Meier’s Civilization Revolution. Go head to head with history’s greatest leaders as you wage war, conduct diplomacy, discover new technologies, inspire your nation and build the most powerful empire the world has ever known.

name: Slope
description: Slope is the ultimate running game that will put your skills to the test. Speed down on a randomized slope. The farther you go, the faster your ball travels. This game might look simple but playing this will give you extreme adrenaline rush. Just remember to avoid obstacles and those red blocks.

name: Dead Space 2
description: Cancelled Nintendo Wii port of Dead Space 2.

name: Medal of Honor: Airborne
description: Originally announced as a cross-generational title that would have two versions - a full-fledged HD version on PlayStation 3, Xbox 360, and PC platforms, and a second, scaled back version developed for the less powerful hardware of the Wii, PlayStation 2, and original Xbox. The scaled back version was cancelled for all three platforms, Wii included.

name: Metroid Tactics
description: A game pitched by Metroid Prime developers at Retro Studios concluding the release of Metroid Prime 3 as a new direction to head into following the conclusion of the trilogy of Prime games. It was proposed to be similar to the XCOM series of video games that reused assets from the Trilogy games. However, management at Retro Studios rejected the pitch.

name: The Next Big Thing
description: A proposed hybrid video game mixed racing, platforming, and trick performing. The game was cancelled when developers Pandemic Studios could not find a publisher, and the company shutdown shortly afterwards.

name: Red Faction: B.E.A.S.T.
description: An entry of the Red Faction series of games being developed exclusively for the Wii's hardware. Publisher THQ's financial troubles caused them to close down developer Locomotive Games, leading to the game's cancellation as well.

name: SBK-08: Superbike World Championship
description: Sin descripción

name: Scalebound
description: Privately, the game was originally in development for the Wii briefly. A prototype was developed for the Wii shortly after the completion of the original Bayonetta game, first involving Wii remote was used to direct and communicate with dinosaurs as a little girl character. The game transition to an older male protagonist shortly before the prototype was dropped to focus on The Wonderful 101.

name: Shadows of the Damned
description: Well after its 2011 Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3 release, developer head Goichi Suda noted in passing that the game had started as a Wii game, but that version of the game was cancelled for reasons he would not elaborate on.

name: Son of the Dragon
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Generations
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic the Hedgehog
description: Sin descripción

name: Sphere
description: An unannounced game by N-Space discovered in a widespread leak of Nintendo's data in 2021. Described as a Metal Gear Solid type game with a female protagonist. Never released in any capacity, and N-Space closed down in 2016.

name: Crystal Wish: Candy Chase
description: It's the night of Halloween and three young girls are about to experience their spookiest night ever thanks to a magical friend way too willing to give them a thrilling night.

name: Tecmo Bowl: Kickoff
description: A Tecmo Bowl remake was announced for both the Wii and the Nintendo DS. While the DS received Tecmo Bowl: Kickoff, the Wii version was cancelled in favor with developing and releasing Family Fun Football, a title that was thought to more closely cater to the Wii's casual userbase.

name: The Wonderful 101
description: Early plans for the game included releasing it on the Wii with existing Nintendo characters, though plans stalled and the game was put on hold. The game concepts were later revived as an original game with new characters for the Wii U and released in 2013.

name: Pikmin Finder
description: Pikmin Finder is a mobile browser AR game created to promote Pikmin 4.The gameplay involves looking around to find sprouts, plucking them, and sending those Pikmin to find treasures. The game has 20 treasures to find in total. Once all 20 have been found, a prompt appears to reset all game progress and collect the Pikmin and treasures again.

name: Generic Brazilian Favela Game with Generic Enemies 2003
description: Generic Brazilian Favela Game with Generic Enemies 2003 is a "very buggy" game developed by Joeveno, where you're Sledge MoreNeo, and you're wandering around a Generic Brazilian Favela because you suddenly appeared there. Heavily inspired by Max Payne, the game has bullet time, an old-school third-person camera, classic 2000s lock aiming, Matrix-styled hand-to-hand combat, rail grinding, and more. It also has a motorcycle.

name: Nights: Moonlight Dreams...
description: Nights: Moonlight Dreams... is a fan game of Nights into Dreams, developed by Marco Medina.

name: Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Tetris
description: Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Tetris is a fan game where, after causing a dimensional rift and giving rise to an evil double of himself, the Badniks hold an enigmatic "Mean Bean Tetris" contest. Only the original Dr. Robotnik, with his cunning and skills, will be able to prove that he is the real one.

name: Archons: Arena
description: Archons: Arena is a deck builder with RPG elements. Manage your skills and equipment to survive another around.

name: 4x4 Offroad Car Exploration
description:
Embark on a thrilling offroad adventure in "4x4 Offroad Car Exploration." Get ready to navigate through rugged terrain, dense forests, and treacherous landscapes to uncover hidden traps. As a fearless explorer, your mission is to traverse the wild and treacherous terrain, locating and collecting all traps to unlock new locations and acquire powerful offroad vehicles.
Each location presents a distinct environment with its own set of traps to conquer.

name: Yummy Jewels
description: Go on a candy puzzle adventure.

name: Persha and the Magic Labyrinth: Arabian Nyaights
description:
Cats and magic take centre stage!?
New experience!? Puzzle battle RPG!!

name: Bus Simulator: City Driving Ultimate
description: Step into the driver's seat of a variety of meticulously detailed buses and embark on a captivating journey through bustling city streets in "Bus Simulator - City Driving Ultimate" As a skilled bus operator, your mission is to faithfully follow designated routes, pick up passengers, and deliver them safely to their destinations. The city's intricate traffic patterns, unpredictable road conditions, and the needs of your passengers will put your driving prowess and multitasking abilities to the test.

name: Jump, Race, Fly
description: "Jump, Race, Fly - Bundle" delivers an engaging gaming experience with three captivating titles, each offering a distinct adventure.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series Ninja Sneaking vs: Battle on the Couch
description:
Asymmetrical Action for 2~4 Players!
Attack & Defense: Become the Greatest Ninja!

name: Tappy Golf
description: The most easy, fun and addicting golf game you'll ever play! Each hole is procedurally generated. So you'll experience an infinite number of golf holes that are different every time you play! Just tap the screen to stop the aiming arrow. That's it! But careful... the arrow gets faster the better you score.

name: Space Battle: Sea Battle
description:
Sirens are wailing, the enemy space fleet is approaching: let the Space Battle begin!
Take control of the command center and coordinate the space defense in your area in Space Battle. Discover enemy spaceships and command the shelling in your sector by determining the correct coordinates, just like in Battleship.

name: Block Puzzle Kool
description: Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age. Simply Drag the blocks, and fill up all grids. From now on, let's enjoy a simple and addictive puzzle game!

name: The Evil Leafy Maze Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Project 32X: Sonic Mars
description:
Sonic and his friends found out about the Cyberspace and its inhabitants, and Robotnik is using this world to create his empire, now everyone has to try to save the Cyberspace with the power of the Cyber Emeralds.

Project 32X is a fan game that attempts to revive the original Sonic Mars/Sonic 32X project.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: Bye Focal II
description: You don't see many cars like this around! Especially when they whiz past you at full speed! Bye Focal II will take you to victory in the blink of an eye! So get ready to say “Bye Bye” to your opponents and “Hello” to the finish line!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: Thanksgiving Pack
description: It's time to say thank you, 3 times, with a triple gift for your collection: Hot Seat, a toilet-on-wheels, to flush the rivals away. Rigor Motor, a die-hard racing coffin for your Death matches and to end with a bang BMW 3.0 CSL Racing!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: Mattel Dream Mobile
description: Its futuristic design is a piece of history: Mattel Dream Mobile was the first toy car created by Mattel. This stunning bubble-topped convertible looks ready to take off and fill the future of your opponents with broken dreams!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: AcceleRacers Deora II
description: Put yourself in the shoes (or more likely beach sandals) of Vert Wheeler and hop in this fabulous masterpiece from Highway 35 World Race. Ride the wave of success with the legendary Deora II with Wave Rippers livery.

name: Old School
description: Relive your school days in 3D, where old school graphics bring back timeless fun! Create your own star student and attend a schedule full of classes in time to gather the knowledge you need to thrive, while an equally important popularity contest challenges you survive...

name: Spark vs. The Marshmallows
description: 4 Player Plug-and-Play co-op/solo adventure. MUSICAL BOSS FIGHTS! LEVEL PROGRESSION! Unlockable abilities. A SWING ability. This is Spark, where you play as a tiny flame to fight through varieties of Marshmallow enemies to save your fellow flames!

name: Heart Attack
description: Heart Attack is an FPS Roguelite game where you survive against waves of security robots. Buy the next-tier weapon and upgrade it as well. Protect a moving vehicle from increasingly powerful and diverse security robots alone or with friends.

name: Ascendant
description: Ascendant is set in a magical dungeon where you must recapture the souls of escaped creatures. Take on the role of a fearsome mage collecting wand caps and amulets to unlock powerful abilities. Defeat legendary abominations to acquire ascendant caps and fight your way to freedom.

name: Anx Defense
description: Defend your Nexus by placing mirrors and buildings on the path of your projectiles. Deflect, empower, manage and solve each map using your creative and strategic mind.

name: Boing Bang Adventure
description: Boing Bang Adventure is a 2D arcade game in the style of the classic arcade game "Pang" Face more than 40 levels, divided in 7 different areas in single player or in local co-op!

name: Escape from the Room of the Sex Dolls
description: Escape from a room full of puzzles with Aicha, the breast-expanding robot erotic service doll! A new combination of classic escape room gameplay and stunning 3D chest animation. Will you be able to solve all the puzzles and get out of the room safely?

name: Entities
description: Dive into horror in Entities. Solo or up to 4-player matches offer dynamic puzzles and relentless entities hunting you. Investigate, unlock paths, and survive in lawless zones as a private operator. Tools, teamwork, and terror await. Uncover chilling truths.

name: Destiny of Immortal
description: Fate of Creation "is a meat pigeon, cultivation of immortals, and storyline game. You accidentally obtained one of the most precious treasures of creation and embarked on the path of cultivating immortals.

name: Futanari Girlfriends
description: Futanari girlfriends is a classic puzzle game with addictive mechanics and beautiful sexy girls. Solve puzzles to bring scenes and unlock levels.
